WooCommerce.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40" css=".vc_custom_1489784665591{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Optimized For Speed" heading_type="h2" icon_type="linecons" hover_white_text="" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#f64744" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-data" heading_size="18px" icon_size="28px" container_left_padding="50px"]One of the fastest and best coded themes on the marketplace you can't go wrong.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Events Calendar Support" heading_type="h2" icon_type="linecons" hover_white_text="" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#f64744" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-calendar" heading_size="18px" icon_size="28px" container_left_padding="50px"]The Events Calendar plugin works and looks great with the Total theme.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Loved By Many" heading_type="h2" icon_type="linecons" hover_white_text="" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#f64744" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart" heading_size="18px" icon_size="28px" container_left_padding="50px"]With thousands of sales and a 5 star rating you can trust the theme is quality.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" column_spacing="0px" font_size="18px"]

With Almost 100,000 sales the WPBakery Page Builder is one of if not the most popular page builders out there.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="50px"][vcex_image lightbox="true" align="center" lightbox_type="video" lightbox_video_overlay_icon="true" overlay_style="" width="800px" image_id="115" lightbox_url="http://youtube.com/embed/2JyW4yAyTl0?autoplay=1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1489784644316{padding-top: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Core Theme Features" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="28px"][vcex_divider width="50px" height="2px" margin="top:20"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1489784638499{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Page Builder" heading_type="h2" icon_type="linecons" hover_white_text="" heading_weight="normal" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-settings" heading_size="24px" icon_size="58px" icon_bottom_margin="25px" icon_color="#22c4c1"]Total includes an unmodified version of the WPBakery page builder plugin formerly known as Visual Composer.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Live Customizer" heading_type="h2" icon_type="linecons" hover_white_text="" heading_weight="normal" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-params" heading_size="24px" icon_size="58px" icon_bottom_margin="25px" icon_color="#f16446"]Hundreds of Customizer settings allow you to tweak almost every aspect of the theme with a live preview before publishing your changes.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="WooCommerce" heading_type="h2" icon_type="linecons" hover_white_text="" heading_weight="normal" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-shop" heading_size="24px" icon_size="58px" icon_bottom_margin="25px" icon_color="#a764a7"]Set up your online shop today with Total and WooCommerce. It's never been so easy to open your web shop.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1489784632820{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Hot Theme" heading_type="h2" icon_type="linecons" hover_white_text="" heading_weight="normal" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-fire" heading_size="24px" icon_size="58px" icon_bottom_margin="25px" icon_color="#f7b432"]A popular theme for over 5 years now, Total continues to grow and deliver. You will not be unsatisfied when choosing this template.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Quick Setup" heading_type="h2" icon_type="linecons" hover_white_text="" heading_weight="normal" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-clock" heading_size="24px" icon_size="58px" icon_bottom_margin="25px" icon_color="#34495e"]You can use the included Demo Importer to quickly setup your site like this and then tweak it according to your specific needs.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Elite Developer" heading_type="h2" icon_type="linecons" hover_white_text="" heading_weight="normal" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-diamond" heading_size="24px" icon_size="58px" icon_bottom_margin="25px" icon_color="#04a9fb"]WPExplorer has been creating and selling themes for over 10 years now. They know what they are and deliver on quality.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" column_spacing="0px" wpex_shape_divider_top="arrow" css=".vc_custom_1585018584697{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;background-color: #9b59b6 !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_icon icon_type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-truck" link_local_scroll="" float="center" color="#ffffff" custom_size="48px"][vc_empty_space height="10px"][vcex_heading text="Open Your Shop" tag="h2" text_align="center" color="#ffffff" font_size="32px"][vc_empty_space height="30px"][vc_column_text width="600px" color="#ffffff" font_size="18px"]

Total includes built-in support for the WooCommerce plugin so your store looks nice and you can access various customizer settings.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="30px"][vc_single_image image="97"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1585018008714{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Responsive & Mobile Friendly" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="28px"][vcex_divider width="50px" height="2px" margin="top:20"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="seven" heading="50+ Builder Blocks" heading_type="h3" icon="ticon ticon-cubes" heading_weight="400" heading_size="18px" icon_size="34px" container_right_padding="70px" icon_color="#3498db"]Over 50 custom builder modules to choose from that are exclusive to the Total WordPress theme.[/vcex_icon_box][vc_empty_space height="40px"][vcex_icon_box style="seven" heading="SEO Ready" heading_type="h3" icon="fa fa-bullseye" heading_weight="400" icon_color="#3498db" item.title: Love it
item.dc:creator: andyauthor
item.content:encoded: Great coding, so flexible and makes it possible to develop and deliver unique websites for clients very quickly. Love the customer support too.

item.title: Very Happy
item.dc:creator: andyauthor
item.content:encoded: Very happy with this theme. Easy to setup and customize settings. Including visual composer within the theme should be the standard for all themes. Jam packed with options to build a great responsive website. A+ theme.

item.title: Highly Recommended
item.dc:creator: andyauthor
item.content:encoded: Love the support with this theme! It's always quick and easy to follow. We picked this theme for the drag'n'drop feature, so that our employees of all levels of experience are able to make updates. Highly recommended theme by OIMP.
